definition: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
Lent (Christian period of forty days before Easter)

sentences.chinese: 今天星期三是齋期開始。

sentences.english: This is the first day of the Greek Orthodox Great Lent.
sentences.chinese: 這是希臘東正教大齋期的第一天。

sentences.english: They had a fast of 3 days.
In Lent he gives up smoking and drinking.
sentences.chinese: 在大齋期，他戒菸葡萄酒。
